name: Run Barn!
description:
Run Barn! is an Endless Game with a 2D platformer concept Using OpenGL, telling about a paper called Barn, where he is almost sucked up by a vacuum cleaner, so as not to be sucked by the vacuum cleaner, Barn has to run continuously. Unfortunately not only barn is sucked by the vacuum cleaner, other objects such as tissues, paper, leaves, etc. also got sucked by the vacuum cleaner. Therefore Barn must also be able to pass the other objects that are sucked by the vacuum cleaner, so as not to be sucked into the vacuum cleaner is like other objects.
